[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /global/wiz_file_comm.c

This file contains all the file related commands and information for the creators.

Written by Pinkfish

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /global/wiz_object_comm.c, /global/wiz_channels.c, /global/playtester.c, /global/le.c, /global/wiz_info_comm.c and /global/wiz_inter_comm.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/ls.h, /include/player_handler.h, /include/cmds/friends.h, /include/login_handler.h, /include/playtesters.h and /include/creator.h

Method index

command(string)
process_input(string)
query_allowed()
This method returns the current list of people in the allowed array for the creator.
query_ed_setup()
This method returns the saved setup for the inbuild ed command.
query_in_editor()
This method returns the value of the in editor flag.
query_invis()
This method returns the current invisibility level of the object.
query_last_location()
This method returns the last location of the creator for use by goback.
query_path()
This method returns the creators current working directory.
query_visible(object)
This method returns the current visibility status of this creator in respect to the other object.
review()
This method prints out any interesting bits of reviewable information available on the creator.
set_ed_setup(int)
This method sets the current flags for the inbuild ed command.
set_in_editor(mixed)
This method sets the current in editor flag.
set_last_location(mixed)
This method stores the last location of the creator for use by goback.
wiz_commands()
This method adds in all the creator commands to the player.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
query_allowed
nomask string * query_allowed()
This method returns the current list of people in the allowed array for the creator.

Returns:
the current list of allowed people
query_ed_setup
int query_ed_setup()
This method returns the saved setup for the inbuild ed command. THis allows certain flag settings to be saved between sessions.

Returns:
the current ed setup flags
See also:
set_ed_setup()
query_in_editor
mixed query_in_editor()
This method returns the value of the in editor flag. It will return non-zero if the player is in an editor.

Returns:
non-zero in editor, 0 not in an editor
See also:
set_in_editor()
query_invis
nomask int query_invis()
This method returns the current invisibility level of the object. This will return 0 if the object is not invisible, 1 for creator invisible, 2 for director invisible and 3 for trustee invisible.

Returns:
the current invisibility level
query_last_location
mixed query_last_location()
This method returns the last location of the creator for use by goback.

Returns:
string last location.
query_path
string query_path()
This method returns the creators current working directory.

Returns:
the current working directory
query_visible
int query_visible(object thing)
This method returns the current visibility status of this creator in respect to the other object. This does the allow level checking and all sorts of exciting things.

It will return 1 for creator invisible, 2 for director invisible, 3 for trustee invisible.

Parameters:
thing - the object to test the visibility against
Returns:
0 if not invisible, non-zero if invisible
review
int review()
This method prints out any interesting bits of reviewable information available on the creator. This is used by the review command.

Returns:
always returns 1
set_ed_setup
void set_ed_setup(int i)
This method sets the current flags for the inbuild ed command. THis allows certain flag settings to be saved between sessions.

Parameters:
i - the new flags for the ed command
See also:
query_ed_setup()
set_in_editor
void set_in_editor(mixed what)
This method sets the current in editor flag.

Parameters:
what - the new value of the in editor flag
See also:
query_in_editor()
set_last_location
void set_last_location(mixed loc)
This method stores the last location of the creator for use by goback.

Parameters:
string - location

Protected Functions

These are functions that only objects inheriting the class can access.

command
mixed command(string txt)
process_input
string process_input(string inp)
wiz_commands
void wiz_commands()
This method adds in all the creator commands to the player. This will be called when the play initialy logs onto the game.
